description:
A customized version of a machine from MOBILE SUIT Z GUNDAM. It belongs to the Nemesis team, and is used by Aila Jyrki√§inen of Finland. Its main weapon is the lance bit. Like the base machine, it is equipped with many remote-controlled weapons, and even when fighting multiple enemies at once, it is powerful enough to overwhelm them.
Source: Official Website
name: NMX-004 Qubeley Papillon
